title: 12 sides, six faces
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I had a red cube like this
"},{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/VAN7QLvQkk-_20160430_104821.JPG?width=1200"}},{"type":"text","text":"
I took "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"26"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" more such cube(red from all sides) and joined them to form a bigger cube"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(3×3×3=27) red cubes"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". And painted it blue from all of its six sides from the outside, like this."},{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/07lE05FJnG-_20160430_104851.JPG?width=1200"}},{"type":"text","text":"
Now , I took "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"26"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" more such cubes (with each cube having ("},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3×3×3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":") red cubes painted blue from outside), and joined them to form a much bigger cube"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"(9×9×9=729 cubes)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and painted it Green from all its six sides from the outside like this:"},{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/uploads/JLDEEg0kcd-_20160430_104752.JPG?width=1200"}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"How many smaller cubes "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"the"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"one"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"that"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"I"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"had"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"at"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"the "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"starting"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are painted green on "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" side, blue on "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sides and red on the other "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" sides? "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This is fourth problem of the set "},{"type":"text","text":"Just Imagine","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]}]}]}

title: 12th Power

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \sin^{2}x=\alpha"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \cos^{2}x=\beta"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
Now, we have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \alpha+\beta=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
According to the question, "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \alpha^{5}+\beta^{5}=\frac{11}{36}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
So, taking "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \alpha=\frac{1}{2}+x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \beta=\frac{1}{2}-x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and after some simplifications, we get        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"5x^{4}+\frac{5x^{2}}{2}+\frac{1}{16}=\frac{11}{36}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"            "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"which can be easily solved to yeild "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle x^{2}=\frac{1}{12}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "},{"type":"hardBreak"},{"type":"text","text":"
So,            "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left(\sin^{2}x\right)^{6}+\left(\cos^{2}x\right)^{6}=\alpha^{6}+\beta^{6}=\left(\frac{1}{2}+x\right)^{6}+\left(\frac{1}{2}-x\right)^{6}=2x^{6}+\frac{15x^{4}}{2}+\frac{15x^{2}}{8}+\frac{1}{32}=\frac{13}{54}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"             "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence, making the answer "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle \boxed{67}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a=\sin^2 x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b=\cos^2 x"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".  Then"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{aligned} a+b & = 1
\\ a^2+b^2 & = (a+b)^2 - 2ab = 1- 2{\color{#3D99F6}ab} = 1-2\color{#3D99F6} \alpha & \small \color{#3D99F6} \text{Let }\alpha = ab
\\ a^3+b^3 & = (a+b)(a^2+b^2) - ab(a+b) = 1 - 3\alpha
\\ a^4+b^4 & = 1 - 3\alpha - \alpha(1-2\alpha) = 1-4\alpha + 2\alpha^2
\\ a^5+b^5 & = 1-4\alpha + 2\alpha^2 - \alpha (1 - 3\alpha) = 1 - 5\alpha + 5\alpha^2
\end{aligned} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{aligned} \sin^{10}x + \cos^{10}x & = 1 - 5\alpha + 5\alpha^2 = \frac {11}{36}
\\ \implies 5\alpha^2 - 5\alpha + \frac {25}{36} & = 0
\\ \alpha^2 - \alpha + \frac 5{36} & = 0
\\ \left(\alpha - \frac 16\right) \left(\alpha - \frac 56\right) & = 0 
\\ \implies \alpha & = \frac 16 & \small \color{#3D99F6} \text{Since }\alpha = \frac {\sin^2 2x}4 \le \frac 14 
\end{aligned} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"And "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{aligned} \sin^{12}x + \cos^{12}x & = a^6+b^6 
\\ & = \frac {11}{36} - \alpha (1-4\alpha + 2\alpha^2)
\\ & = \frac {11}{36} - \frac 16 \left(1-4\times \frac 16 + 2\times \frac 1{36} \right)
\\ & = \frac {13}{54}
\end{aligned} "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+n = 13+54 = \boxed{67}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}
